attributes.action: allow access to mp's expenses under the freedom of information act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mp's have hyporcritically voted to deny access under the freedom of information act to expenses claimed by  mp's.There are existing safeguards to prevent sensative information being divulged regarding mp's correspondants.As mp's expenses and salaries are funded by the general public we have a right as a democracy to ask for access as to how much of our money  is being payed to mp's.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
